p: The seed powder of P. odoratissimus (1 kg) was macerated three times within 5 days with a total of 1500 mL of absolute methanol and stirred regularly. The supernatant was filtered with Whatman filter paper, collected, and concentrated with a rotary evaporator at 64 °C. The concentrated sample was stored in a sealed brown bottle at 4 °C for further analysis.
